definition: China Television Company (CTV), Taiwan (abbr. for 中國電視公司|中国电视公司[Zhong1 guo2 Dian4 shi4 Gong1 si1])
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: He looked out of the window and found his neighbour's house was on fire.
sentences.chinese: 他背窗中视去，收明邻居的房子着水了。

sentences.english: In addition, the measurement of seeing in modern astronomical site testing is introduced briefly.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了现代天文选址中视宁度的测量。

sentences.english: CTV said that results in the desired range, still has room to grow.
sentences.chinese: 中视表示这样的成绩在预期范围内，还有成长的空间。

sentences.english: In addition, the measurement of seeing in modern astronomical site testing…
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了现代天文选址中视宁度的测量。

definition: Chinese Television System (CTS), Taiwan (abbr. for 中華電視|中华电视[Zhong1 hua2 Dian4 shi4])
abbr. for 臺灣電視公司|台湾电视公司, Taiwan Television (TTV)
China Youth (official newspaper) (abbr. for 中國青年報|中国青年报[Zhong1 guo2 Qing1 nian2 Bao4])
Radio Television Hong Kong (RTHK), public broadcaster
to broadcast through satellite/satellite (TV etc)/shangxing acupoint (DU23)
Virupaksa (on of the Four Heavenly Kings)
